internalDatabase.query: SELECT (last_execution) FROM last_execution_of_flows WHERE tenant_id = '{{data.var.tenantId}}' AND flow='{{data.var.flowName}}' AND (trigger_type='partial' OR trigger_type IS NULL)

steps.description: This tool is designed to execute the getAllCustomerAttributes operation on the Bigcommerce platform. internalDatabase.query:
SELECT record_key, record_data, external_id
FROM "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}" WHERE last_published_date is null

internalDatabase.query:
UPDATE "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}"
SET 
"last_synced_status" = ?,
"last_published_date" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
"updated_at" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE record_key='{{data.var.CustomerEmail}}';

dbQueryParams.value: Record not found in the target platform.

internalDatabase.query:
UPDATE "{{data.var.tranzettaTable}}"
SET 
"external_id" = ?,
"last_synced_status" = ?,
"last_published_date" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
"updated_at" = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE record_key=?;
